title: Jennifer Arcuri: I saved Boris Johnson's phone number under the code name 'Alexander the Great'
text:
Jennifer Arcuri has revealed she saved Boris Johnson's phone number under the code name "Alexander the Great" to protect his identity, as she came under pressure to explain her relationship with the Prime Minister while working as a tech entrepreneur in London.

Ms Arcuri said she would not answer questions about an alleged affair with Mr Johnson because she had been mistreated by the British media.

But she said she saved Mr Johnson's phone number as "Alexander the Great" to protect his identity after she met him at a tech summit in October 2011.

Asked on ITV's Good Morning Britain whether she had an intimate relationship with Mr Johnson, Ms Arcuri replied: “Because the press have objectified...
description: Jennifer Arcuri has revealed she saved Boris Johnson's phone number under the code name "Alexander the Great" to protect his identity, as she came under pressure to explain her relationship with the Prime Minister while working as a tech entrepreneur in London.
